message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll be very happy with the deal.

I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price point. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9800. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10200. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price point. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9900. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
